mapper.sql: id, containerId, alertTime, alertLongTime, alertType, alertContent, lat, lon, readed,alarm_num,gpsPosition,updateTime,updateLongTime, companyId
mapper.select:
select
from alert where 1=1

select
from alert where containerId=#{containerId} and readed='no' and alarm_num=#{alarm_num} and alertLongTime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by id desc limit 1

select
from alert where containerId=#{containerId} and readed='no' and alertLongTime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select ifnull(max(id),0) from alert

select
from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and alertLongTime = #{longTime}

select
from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId})

SELECT
FROM alert WHERE containerId IN (SELECT containerId FROM bindtable WHERE containerId = #{containerId})

select
from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and readed = 'no'
Select From ( select from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and alertLongTime > #{beginTime} order by id desc ) A

SELECT
FROM alert WHERE containerId IN (SELECT containerId FROM container WHERE companyId = #{companyId}) ORDER BY alertTime DESC

select
from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and containerId like concat('%',#{containerId},'%') and alertLongTime > #{beginTime} group by alertLongTime desc

select
from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId=#{companyId} and containerId like concat('%',#{containerId},'%')) and alertType like concat('%',#{alertType},'%') and alertLongTime > #{beginTime} group by alertLongTime desc

select
from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId=#{companyId}) and alertType like concat('%',#{alertType},'%') and alertLongTime > #{beginTime} group by alertLongTime desc
select ifnull(max(id),0) from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) limit 0,1
select count(id) from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId} and alertLongTime > #{beginTime}) and readed = 'no'
select count(id) from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and readed= 'no' group BY alertTime DESC
select count(id) from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and readed= 'no' and alertLongTime > #{beginTime} ORDER BY alertTime DESC
select count(id) from alert where containerId in (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) and readed = 'no'
mapper.insert:
insert into alert
id,
containerId,
alertTime,
alertLongTime,
alertType,
alertContent,
lat,
lon,
readed ,
alarm_num ,
gpsPosition ,
updateTime ,updateLongTime,
companyId ,

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alert GROUP BY containerId
mapper.update:
update alert
containerId = #{containerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alertTime = #{alertTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alertLongTime = #{alertLongTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
alertType = #{alertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alertContent = #{alertContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lat = #{lat},
lon = #{lon},
readed = #{readed},
alarm_num = #{alarm_num},
gpsPosition = #{gpsPosition},
companyId = #{companyId},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update alert
updateTime =now(),
updateLongTime = #{updateLongTime},
where id = #{id}
update alert set readed = 'yes' where id = #{alertId}
mapper.select: SELECT containerId FROM alert WHERE containerId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{containerId} ,'%') GROUP BY containerId
SELECT count(id) FROM alert WHERE containerId = #{containerId} AND alertLongTime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and readed = 'no' AND alarm_num IS NOT NULL
select * from (select * from alert WHERE containerId = #{containerId} and alertLongTime BETWEEN {start} and {end} order by alertLongTime desc) aa group by alarm_num order by alertLongTime desc
select * from (select * from alert WHERE containerId = #{containerId} AND alertLongTime > #{longTime} order by alertLongTime desc)aa group by alarm_num order by alertLongTime desc
select containerId from alert where containerId IN (select containerId from container where companyId = #{companyId}) group by containerId
